attributes.action: Force uninsured motorists to pay up immediately rather than increasing premiums of innocent motorists to cover the losses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should an innocent insurance paying motorist have to suffer financially, because of law breakers?!! This is totally unfair. If someone is uninsured they should be immediately forced to pay up to cover insurance company losses, or taken to court if they refuse to do so.
